meanings.definition: Not enclosed or surrounded by a barrier
meanings.sent1: The unenclosed field stretched out endlessly under the open sky.
meanings.sent2: The animals roamed freely in the unenclosed pasture.
meanings.sent3: The unenclosed garden welcomed visitors with open arms.
meanings.sent4: Her unenclosed heart felt vulnerable yet full of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The unenclosed space felt vast and liberating.

meanings.definition: Not included within a structure or boundary
meanings.sent1: The unenclosed yard allowed the children to play without limits.
meanings.sent2: The unenclosed balcony provided a beautiful view of the city.
meanings.sent3: The unenclosed package seemed to have gone on an adventure of its own.
meanings.sent4: His unenclosed thoughts wandered freely, exploring new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The unenclosed bookshelf overflowed with books of all genres.
